update_model.description: Start application of events that have not yet been applied

args.name: catalogue
args.description: The name of the data catalogue (example: "meetbouten")

args.name: entity
args.description: The name of the data collection (example: "metingen")

import.description: Start an import job for a collection

args.name: catalogue
args.description: The name of the data catalogue (example: "meetbouten")

args.name: collection
args.description: The name of the data collection (example: "metingen")

args.name: application
args.description: The name of the application to import from

args.name: mode
args.description: The import mode: full (default) or random, last5days, ....

prepare.description: Start a prepare job for a catalogue

args.name: catalogue
args.description: The name of the data catalog (example: "brk")

export.description: Start an export job for a collection

args.name: catalogue
args.description: The name of the data catalogue (example: "meetbouten")

args.name: collection
args.description: The name of the data collection (example: "metingen")

args.name: product
args.description: The name of the product to export, (example: "csv_actueel")

args.name: catalogue
args.description: The name of the data catalogue (example: "meetbouten")

args.name: collection
args.description: The name of the data collection (example: "metingen")

args.name: attribute
args.description: The name of the attribute containing the relation to relate (example: "ligt_in_buurt")

export_test.description: Test of exports for a catalogue

args.name: catalogue
args.description: The name of the data catalogue (example: "meetbouten")
